home-hero.text1: Digital parking disc - directly on your mobile.
home-hero.text2: A winning concept in a new, digitalized format.

how.headline: How It Works
how.text1: Open the app, register with your license plate number.
how.text2: Use the map, search function, or zone list to find your parking spot.
how.text3: Once you've found your parking zone, you can review parking rules, start parking, and close the app.

smart-parking.headline: Smart Parking Solution
smart-parking.text1: The parking disc has long been a tool to promote circulation and activity in city centers. It's a fantastic invention that benefits residents, visitors, and local businesses alike. We want to be part of this evolution by creating a free digital parking disc.
smart-parking.bullet1: We aim to support the growth and efficiency of urban areas.
smart-parking.bullet2: Our digital parking disc simplifies the parking process.
smart-parking.bullet3: Any parking attendant systems can easily be integrated with our system.
smart-parking.text2: We're excited to share more about our solution in a meeting.

contact.text1: Whether you have a question, feedback, or need assistance, please fill out the form below, and our team will get back to you as soon as possible.
contact.name: First and Last Name
contact.title: Job Title

why.headline: Why Parking Time?
why.text1: Our digital solution attracts more visitors by eliminating physical discs and reducing fines. This simplifies parking, boosts foot traffic, economic activity, and city vibrancy while reducing stress.
why.text2: Our app lets you effortlessly set, adjust, and monitor parking time. With a user-friendly interface, you can quickly find spots and manage parking. We continuously update based on customer feedback to ensure an efficient and hassle-free experience.
why.text3: Our system for parking attendants integrates seamlessly with your existing setup. A unified system benefits you by streamlining operations and enhancing the experience for personnel by eliminating the need for two different systems and devices. We make this integration efficient, intuitive, and simple!
why.text4: The digital parking disc can eventually optimize parking resources and urban planning through valuable usage data and behavior patterns, leading to a safer society with better control and access to parking spaces.

knowMore.title: Want to know more?
knowMore.paragraf: Contact us to find out more about our solution and how we can implement it in your municipality

download.title: Download now
download.paragraf: The app is free to download for you as a user. However, your municipality must be registered as a customer with us for our app to be valid in your area. If our app is not available in your municipality, you are welcome to contact us or suggest us to your municipality!

contactHero.headline: We would love to hear from you!

aboutHero.title: Parking Time Sweden
aboutHero.paragraf: We are a tech startup dedicated to transforming the parking experience for all stakeholders - parkers, parking attendants, municipalities, and property owners.

ourStory.paragrafOne: Parking Time Sweden is a tech startup aiming to revolutionize the parking experience for all parties involved – the parker, the parking attendant, the municipality, and the property owner.
ourStory.paragrafTwo: We currently offer a free digital parking disc within an app to complement the existing range of parking apps.
ourStory.paragrafThree: Parking Time Sweden was founded in 2021 in Luleå. Today, we operate throughout Sweden with the ambition to expand globally in the coming years, and we hope to have you with us on our journey!

MeetTheTeam.headline: Meet our team
MeetTheTeam.text: Each member brings a unique blend of expertise, passion, and forward-thinking mindset.

faq.subheader1: Here are some common questions answered
faq.q1a: Parking Time is a free to download app that works as a digital parking disc. You just start parking through the app, and parking attendants can view how long your session has lasted.
faq.q2q: How do I use Parking Time?
faq.q2a: and then open it, register with your car's registration number. Use the map, search function, or zone list to find your desired parking location. Once you select your parking zone, you can review any applicable rules, start parking, and then simply close the app.
faq.q3q: How do I get it in my municipality?
faq.q3a: Parking Time is free to download, but can only be used in a municipality that is a registered customer of Parking Time Sweden.
faq.q4a: You can contact your municipality and ask if Parking Time can be implemented.
faq.subheader2: Feel free to contact us if you have any questions

WantToKnowMore.headline: Want to know more?
WantToKnowMore.text: Contact us to find out more about our solution and how we can help you.

OurValues.title: Our Values
OurValues.simplicityParagraf: We strive to create a simple and smooth experience.
OurValues.innovationParagraf: Always striving to improve and make our app a leader in its field.
OurValues.userFriendlyParagraf: It's crucial that our service meets users' needs and enhances their parking experience.
OurValues.CEOQuote: Of all the things you need to think about during the day, parking should be one of the least. Parking should be so seamless that you hardly need to think about it; it should just work. We call this Smart Parking.

NewsPage.title: We are Transforming Parking Experiences!
NewsPage.NewsBox1-paragraf: After one year of using the Parking Time app for all central parking areas, Nässjö municipality reports positive results from the digitalization of the parking disc.
NewsPage.NewsBox2-paragraf: This spring, Parking Time collaborated with students at Changemaker Educations, resulting in innovative and creative solutions.
NewsPage.NewsBox3-Title: Winner of the SKAPA Talent Award
NewsPage.NewsBox3-paragraf: Parking Time won the SKAPA Talent award in Norrbotten for its innovative digital parking solution, recognized for understanding market needs.
NewsPage.Subscribe-paragraf: We are expanding quickly, stay updated via a newsletter
